gmControl
directive in module angulargm

Description

A directive for attaching custom controls to a gmMap You may have multiple per gmMap To use, put this tag on an html element and the element and its children will be placed into the map at gm-position. See Custom Controls for more details

Usage

as attribute
<ANY gm-control
     gm-position="{expression}"
     gm-index="{expression}">
   ...
</ANY>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
gm-positionexpression

an angular expression that evaluates to one of the google.maps.ControlPosition constant values. for example use TOP_RIGHT to place in the upper right section

gm-indexexpression

not required. Should be a number. Will be sent to google as the control index. Controls with a lower index are placed first.
